mapper.select: SELECT insertion_timestamp, total_bytes_recv, total_bytes_sent, COALESCE(total_bytes_recv - LAG(total_bytes_recv) OVER (ORDER BY insertion_timestamp), 0) AS diff_bytes_recv, COALESCE(total_bytes_sent - LAG(total_bytes_sent) OVER (ORDER BY insertion_timestamp), 0) AS diff_bytes_sent FROM ( SELECT insertion_timestamp, SUM(bytes_recv) AS total_bytes_recv, SUM(bytes_sent) AS total_bytes_sent FROM net WHERE interface IN ('eno1', 'docker0') GROUP BY insertion_timestamp ) AS subquery ORDER BY insertion_timestamp DESC LIMIT 60;
